answers.answer: Awe, don't be upset, and you didn't fail your daughter! I know how hard it can be to not want a ton of sweets and things while pregnant! You can google gestational diabetes, and learn all about it! Good luck hun!

Look on the bright side you will probably get to see your little girl more now as they will monitor more closely. You didn't fail her though. Its very common to get diabetes and its only for a short time and will be gone and you will be holding your little girl. Its already may and july is close.

Thank you ladies! Its just hard because I have alot of ppl in my family with diabetes one being my little brother and I know how hard it is on him. Im really scared.of taking.my blood 4 times a day and the more I read on it the more I get scared.

Don't be scared!! It's great that you know and you can now do something about it. I have a pretty healthy diet and I'm not hugely overweight but I've just found out I have it for the second time. Some people are just prone to having it, you haven't done anything wrong!!
Thank you..... I just feel like an outsider because I dont know anyone that had this.

question: My 3 hr glucose test :( I feel so embarrassed and like I failed my daughter. After I.got off the phone with the nurse I couldn't stop.crying. anyone else fail their test and how do u deal with it?
title: failed
